modal.title: Felipe Araújo — Founder & CEO
modal.body:
I'm Felipe Araújo, a Brazilian entrepreneur and the founder of MoonRise. My journey brings together technology, programming, marketing, and management — experiences that taught me how real results are built: with discipline, transparency, and consistency.

MoonRise was born with a clear mission: to prove it's possible to build a transparent, solid, and enduring financial ecosystem. We started by delivering before selling — developing MoonWallet and our transparency foundation from day one with our own resources.

My personal allocation is minimal and locked by public contract, reinforcing that our focus is sustainable growth, not speculation. We believe in real value created by execution, outcomes, and trust.

MoonRise wasn't born to promise. It was born to deliver — with clarity, responsibility, and a long-term purpose.
